title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Data Scientist to analyze large amounts of raw information to find patterns and insights. Must be proficient in Python, SQL, and machine learning. Experience with data visualization tools like Power BI or Tableau is a plus.

title: Software Engineer
description: The candidate will be responsible for designing and developing scalable software solutions. Must have experience in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and REST APIs. Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure is desirable.

title: Marketing Manager
description: Responsible for planning and executing marketing campaigns. Should have experience in SEO, content marketing, social media, and market analysis. Strong communication and leadership skills required.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Analyze financial data and create models to support business decisions. Strong skills in Excel, forecasting, budgeting, and financial reporting. Familiarity with ERP systems like SAP is a plus.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user-friendly web and mobile applications. Should have experience with Figma, Adobe XD, and usability testing. Understanding of user-centered design principles is essential.
